index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL AND HEALTH SERVICES
summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the acquisition and development of the Noonan Clinic property as the site for the Greenwood Senior Center; authorizing acceptance of a deed for the premises; authorizing acceptance of Referendum 29 grant funds from the State of Washington, and authorizing the expenditure of said Referendum 29 funds together with Block Grant and Title V monies previously appropriated.
